<script type="text/javascript">
    $(document).ready(function(){
            
        var textAreaid =  document.getElementById("alertas_alertas_teste_tb_alertas");
        var htmlAlerta = textAreaid.value;
        textAreaid.style.display = "none";
        
        if(htmlAlerta === "" || htmlAlerta == null){
            $("div#alertas_alertas_teste_section1").parent().remove();
        }

    });
</script>

<script type="text/javascript">
    $(window).load(function(){
        //var alertasID = "field2";
        
        
        //store the value to a field
        var tbAlertaId = "alertas_alertas_teste_tb_alertas";
        var htmlAlerta = $('[name='+tbAlertaId+']:enabled').val();


         
        //present in HTML
        $(".field2").html(htmlAlerta)
    });
</script>
